item.title: Vitamin D and Covid-19
item.description: The New York Times had a recent piece about the puzzling ways that Covid-19 has spread across the world. In it they articulate a number of possible theories about why Covid-19 has effected some countries more than others, but I think they left out one potential explanation: Vitamin D status. The story so far So far the story weâ€™ve been told about Covid-19 is that it is an extremely dangerous virus that spreads expoentially.
